name: SMC Smile Baby Diaper Pants S (4-8 kg)
description:
SMC brings Smile baby diaper made of ultra soft sheets for the maximum comfort of your baby. Its leg cuffs and high absorption system prevent leakage. Its super gel technology protects baby’s skin from germ by performing the fastest and maximum absorption. Flexi ear and waist band let baby move comfortably. It has wetness mark to indicate when it’s time to change. This diaper guarantees 12 hours of protection. Manufacturer: SMC enterprise ltd.

name: Kidstar Baby Belt Diaper L (9-18 kg)
description:
Kidstar baby diaper comes with a unique elastic waistband to fit with the baby's body perfectly and avoid leakage. Its cottony-soft top sheet keeps the baby dry and minimizes diaper rash. A breathable back layer promotes air circulation effectively. Its acquisition distribution layer helps liquid diffuse, keeps liquid away from the skin, and keeps skin dry and clean. 360-degree core double leak guard avoids side leakage. Wetness indicator reminds mother when to change diaper. Manufacturer: Advance Personal Care Ltd. Size: L  Allowable weight of baby 9-18 kg Quantity: 28 pcs Wetness indicator: Yes Belt system  Only Diaper in Bangladesh which have 360˚ Degree Leak Guard to avoid side leakage

name: Savlon Twinkle Baby Belt Diaper XL 11-25 Kg
description:
If you’re looking for a healthy and comfortable diaper for your baby, Twinkle baby diaper is a good choice. Its absorbent core and dry lock ensure low rewet, keeping your baby’s skin healthy and dry. Its cottony soft top layer and stretchy bands ensure the maximum comfort for baby. Breathable outer layer allows air to circulate inside diaper, thus prevents dampness. The diaper’s leak protection layer and side barriers prevent any leakage. The in-built colour changing wetness indicator lets you know when it’s time for a diaper change.  Manufacturer: ACI limited  Size: XL  Allowable weight of baby: 11-25kg  Quantity : 32 pieces  Wetness indicator: Yes  Belt system      "

name: Bashundhara Baby Diaper Belt ST Series L 7-18 kg
description:
The ultra breathable textile outer surface of Bashundhara Baby Diaper allows fresh air to circulate around your baby's bottom. So your baby's skin stays fresh, dry & healthy at all time. Bashundhara Baby Diaper's the ultra dry layer quickly pulls in wetness away from baby's sensitive skin and blocks it inside the diaper. So, baby is protected for long time even overnight.  Bashundhara Baby diaper keeps baby fresh and active.

name: Kidz Baby Diaper Belt M (5-10 kg)
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from China. Kidz baby diapers are based on German technology. Its Japanese absorbent paper ensures maximum absorbency.    A big elastic waistband fits with the baby's body perfectly. The traceless magic belt makes the diaper easy to put on. The beehive surface is ultra-soft and skin-friendly. The 3-dimensional leak guard prevents leakage. These diapers are free from latex, fragrance, chlorine, phthalate, and petroleum-based lotion. A wetness indicator is there to show the mother when it is time for a change.   Manufacturer: Talzons & Next G  Size:M  Allowable weight of the baby: 5-10 kg  Quantity: 62 Pcs  Wetness indicator: Yes  Belt system  FDA approved. name: Savlon Twinkle Baby Belt Diaper M 6-11 kg
description:
If you’re looking for a healthy and comfortable diaper for your baby, Twinkle baby diaper is a good choice. Its absorbent core and dry lock ensure low rewet, keeping your baby’s skin healthy and dry. Its cottony-soft top layer and stretchy bands ensure the maximum comfort for baby. Breathable outer layer allows air to circulate inside the diaper, thus prevents dampness. The diaper’s leak protection layer and side barriers prevent any leakage. The in-built colour changing wetness indicator lets you know when it’s time for a diaper change.  Manufacturer: ACI limited  Size: M  Allowable weight of baby: 6-11 kg  Quantity: 40 pieces  Wetness indicator: Yes  Belt system
